item.title: KaTeX
item.description: KaTeX # \[f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi\] \(f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi\) $$ L(Y,f(X))=\left{\begin{matrix} 1,Y\neq f(X) \ 0,Y = f(X)\end{matrix}\right. $$
